artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Gifuya Seishichi
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: three separate sheets, unmounted; female figure standing at L behind seated male figure in blue kimono at far L; central seated male figure in striped kimono holding sake glass looking L; seated behind bowl with pink fish and colorful vegetables; two male figures at R are looking L, one is getting up, the other is seated; pink sky with hints of white flower blossoms in background
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 9/16 in. (36.51 × 24.29 cm) (image, sheet, each sheet; vertical ōban triptych)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: R: 梓元好応一魁斎芳年画 {hanmoto no konomi kotaeri Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga} | C, L: 玉桜芳年画 {Gyokuō Yoshitoshi ga}
title: Picture of Stylish Cherry-blossom Viewing at Kibun Koganei
